title: Resolve establishing a special commission on the Dover amendment

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Moore, a petition (accompanied by resolve, Senate, No. 1461) of Michael O. Moore that provisions be made for an investigation and study by a special commission (including members of the General Court) relative to the use and effectiveness of the zoning approval process of educational uses under the so-called Dover amendment.  Municipalities and Regional Government.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/22/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
Hearing scheduled for 07/22/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
Accompanied a new draft, see S2715
